Risk of death from coronavirus

This app calculates overall risk of death from COVID-19. It will be updated with the latest information as soon as it becomes available. Please always come to this page isaric4c.net/risk directly to get the most up-to-date data.

  • Obesity yes/no
  • Cardiac disease yes/no
